input: The most important feature of the Indian Parliament is that

options.A: It is the Union Legislature in India

options.D: The Upper House of the Parliament is never dissolved

explanation: Bicameralism has been one of the most important features of Indiaâ€™s parliamentary democracy. Ever since the coming into force of the Constitution, both the Chambers of Indian Parliament have been complementing each other in more ways than one.
